data.author: Chris Fussell
data.quote: By providing clear objectives for your team, and setting guardrails for how they get there, you will set them on the path to success.

data.author: Philip Sidney
data.quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.

data.author: Hosea Ballou
data.quote: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams.

data.author: Leonard Cohen
data.quote: Success is survival.

data.author: Andre Rieu
data.quote: I know that when I like music, when it touches my heart, that it will touch your heart, too. That, I think, is the secret to my success.

data.author: Octavio Paz
data.quote: Deserve your dream.

data.author: Andy Grove
data.quote: Success breeds complacency. Complacency breeds failure. Only the paranoid survive.

data.author: Edgar Bronfman, Jr.
data.quote: Commercial success still hasn't come to an artist that isn't signed to a record label. There are very few artists that can succeed without the help of a record label. The role of the record label is still required, it's still necessary.

data.author: Nicholas Hoult
data.quote: Other people's success spurs me on to do well and gives me motivation.

data.author: Richard Branson
data.quote: A passionate belief in your business and personal objectives can make all the difference between success and failure. If you aren't proud of what you're doing, why should anybody else be?

data.author: Stephen Hawking
data.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.

data.author: Erwin Rommel
data.quote: Anyone who has to fight, even with the most modern weapons, against an enemy in complete command of the air, fights like a savage against modern European troops, under the same handicaps and with the same chances of success.

data.author: Vera Wang
data.quote: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.

data.author: Jimmy Dean
data.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

data.author: Herbert Spencer
data.quote: People are beginning to see that the first requisite to success in life is to be a good animal.

data.author: Akon
data.quote: Whatever obstacle comes your way, you gotta be prepared to jump over it! And I think that's what separates the legends from the regular artists. It's all in how you manage that success, and how you deal with the controversy when it actually comes.

data.author: Vanessa Carlton
data.quote: I have gone from being a 21-year-old with wide eyes to a 24-year-old woman. With success comes a lot of responsibility and power.

data.author: Ricky Williams
data.quote: There's more to life than success, and if you can try to be more well-rounded, you'll be able to enjoy your success more. It won't own you or control you.

data.author: Lily Tomlin
data.quote: The road to success is always under construction.

data.author: Mark Warner
data.quote: My success was due to good luck, hard work, and support and advice from friends and mentors. But most importantly, it depended on me to keep trying after I had failed.

data.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
data.quote: The manic pursuit of success cost me everything I could love: my wife, my three children, some friends I would have liked to grow old with.

data.author: Wayne Huizenga
data.quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen.

data.author: Ella Fitzgerald
data.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.

data.author: Ramana Maharshi
data.quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.

data.author: Dustin Clare
data.quote: You always draw inspiration from your family or your parents if they've proven to be inspirational. My mother is someone who's always been inspirational to me.
